Player History
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 4/15/1991, off Brent Gaff (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/18/1991, off Jack Morris (STL)...
Traded from Atlanta to Texas on 6/2/1991 (Going to ATL: CF Sammy Sosa. Going to TEX: P Andy Ashby, P Ben McDonald, 3B Jeff Blauser, CF Al Martin)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/14/1991, off Joe Price (BOS)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Kansas City on 8/28/1992...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1992...
2/2/1993: Gets a new one-year contract worth $357,143 through salary arbitration...
